definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)

Bristol port city in southwest England

pinyin: Bu4 li3 si1 tuo1 er3 Hai3 xia2

sentences.english: Some might get no farther than Bristol.
sentences.chinese: 对有些人来说，征程可能不会远于布里斯托。

sentences.english: We set out from Bristol on the 4th of May, 1699.
sentences.chinese: 我们于一六九九年五月四日从布里斯托出发。

sentences.english: Passengers for Newport and Cardiff change at Bristol Parkway.
sentences.chinese: 前往新港和加的夫的旅客请在布里斯托大道换车。

sentences.english: Well, I moved to Bristol when I got here first.
sentences.chinese: 我刚来这儿的时候，搬去了布里斯托。

sentences.english: The train passes through Reading on its way to Bristol.
sentences.chinese: 火车在去布里斯托的路上要经过里丁。

sentences.english: Little tyke fell asleep just as we were flying over Bristol.
sentences.chinese: 小家伙一飞到布里斯托就睡着了。

sentences.english: This plant is now found only on Lundy in the Bristol Channel.
sentences.chinese: 现在这种植物仅只在布里斯托海峡的廊荻才能找到。

definition: Bristol port city in southwest England
Manchester/also written 曼徹斯特|曼彻斯特
Coventry city in West Midlands 西米德蘭茲|西米德兰兹[Xi1 mi3 de2 lan2 zi1], UK
